description:
######Version 1.2.0, Added backup feature, now you can send logs to your mail and fixed the reports problem. ######

ABOUT
•	Tracking your glucose level helps you and your doctor to control diabetes and its many health related issues.
•	The IA Glucose Tracker simplifies glucose data logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple glucose readings at different time intervals.
•	 This app saves the glucose level, time of the measurement and note.
•	In addition to being a convenient data logger the software is also a valuable tool for glucose level tracking.
•	 This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.
  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes of glucose over time on the longitudinal graphs.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
